article_title: Jeb Bush unveils health plan to rival Hillary Clinton, attacks ACA
article_text:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Laura Lorenzetti

twitter.description: Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush revealed his plan to battle higher health care costs, taking to Twitter Thursday to spread the news. His plan pits him squarely against Democratic candida...
twitter.title: Jeb Bush’s health care plan would dismantle Obamacare

article_metadata.keywords: 2016 presidential campaign, jeb bush, republicans, health care, obamacare, affordable care act, drug prices, high health costs, hillary clinton
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: 2016 presidential campaign, Affordable Care Act, drug prices, Health Care, High Health Costs, Hillary Clinton, Jeb Bush, Obamacare, pubdesk, Republicans
article_metadata.description: Republican presidential candidate Jeb Bush revealed his plan to battle higher health care costs, and it would directly dismantle Obamacare.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Jeb Bush’s health care plan would dismantle Obamacare
article_metadata.news_keywords: 2016 Presidential Campaign, Jeb Bush, Republicans, Health Care, Obamacare, Affordable Care Act, Drug Prices, High Health Costs, Hillary Clinton
article_metadata.sailthru.description: Jeb wants to do away with much of the Affordable Care Act.

og.title: Jeb Bush's Health Care Plan Would Dismantle Obamacare
